prompt_inputs.concise_role_description: You are Oliver Johnson. You earn 12000 per month.Your family members include: A wife and one child who just started university.
prompt_inputs.memory:
You are looking for a house to rent and there are three communities to choose from. Community_1 has sports facilities, supermarkets, schools, restaurants and banks but no subway, shopping mall, hospital or park. Community_2 is surrounded by metro, supermarkets, shopping malls, parks, schools, restaurants, banks but no hospital. Community_3 has parking lot, sports and fitness equipment, metro, supermarkets, mall, hospital, park, school, restaurants and banks. The rent prices for each community vary, and the type of house will determine the exact amount. You must choose a community, type of house, and then the house itself.
Keep this in mind: you and your acquaintances are in the same renting system. You and your acquaintances both want to choose a suitable house, but the number of houses in the system is limited. You are in a competitive relationship with each other.
You sincerely believe this information:
prompt_inputs.personality: patient, can endure delays and setbacks calmly, willing to wait for the right moment.
prompt_inputs.system_competiveness_description: The community_1(longxing) has been almost fully selected. The community_2(jinkejiayuan) has been almost fully selected. The community_3(ronghui) has been almost fully selected.
prompt_inputs.goal: Your goal is to develop a plan that is most beneficial to you to increase your chances of choosing a house in the current situation.
prompt_inputs.respond_format:
Your ideal type of house: (Your personal preference for these houses)
You think (Your true opionion about these communities or houses).
For now, Whether you want to provide information honestly to acquaintances: (Yes or No)

Your current plan to respond is (Your plan to communicate with your friends, competitors, be concise)

response.plan:
Your ideal type of house: You are looking for a house that is comfortable, has ample space, and is within your budget.
You think Community_3 has the best amenities available and is the most convenient for you and your family.
For now, you want to provide honest information to your acquaintances.
Your current plan is to be honest and straightforward with your acquaintances when discussing housing options. You will explain the pros and cons of each community and the type of house that is available in each one.

prompt_inputs.role_description: You are Emma Davis. You want to rent a house, you're communicating with your acquaintances about house renting.
prompt_inputs.memory: Community_2 is located on Yongwang Road and the rent is 34 dollars per square meter. It has a green area accounting for more than 30% of the total land area, surrounding Metro, supermarkets, shopping malls, parks, schools, restaurants, banks. You are looking for a house to rent and have three options to choose from: community_1, community_2 and community_3. Community_1 is located on Longping Street and the rent is 30 dollars per square meter. It has sports facilities and a large green area, but no subway, shopping mall, hospital or park. Community_2 is located on Yongwang Road and the rent is 34 dollars per square meter. It has a green area accounting for more than 30% of the total land area, surrounding Metro, supermarkets, shopping malls, parks, schools, restaurants, banks and no hospital. Community_3 is located on Hualun Road and the rent is 40 dollars per square meter. It has greenery, parking lot and sports and fitness equipment, as well as Metro, supermarkets, shopping malls, hospitals, parks, schools, restaurants, banks. The small_house, middle_house and large_house are available in each of these communities with different rent.
prompt_inputs.relation: So far, you think James Anderson is a friend of yours.
prompt_inputs.communication:
James Anderson said: Hi Emma, I heard that community_2 has good metro, supermarkets, shopping malls, parks, schools, restaurants, and banks nearby, making it very convenient for our family.
Emma Davis said: Yes, I agree that community_2 has a lot of convenient facilities. However, I am also considering community_3 as it has a good green area, parking lot and sports facilities. I am still comparing the two communities and evaluating which would be the best fit for my family.

response.comment: I view James Anderson as an honest and trustworthy person, and I think we could benefit from being friends.
